changes: Removed character-specific accessories (A4 awakening and exclusive)
Character accessories now sourced from character database only
Accessories view will combine both sources dynamically

stat_cleanup.action: Removed stat modifier effects (duplicated in stats section)

specific_fixes: Orb of King Dulin: Removed 7 zero stats
Brilliant Tactician's Medal: Removed 8 zero stats
Light of Succession: Removed 8 zero stats
Sage Helva's Orb: Removed 8 zero stats
Cleric's Cloak Pin: Removed 8 zero stats
Dance Duelist's Barrette: Removed 8 zero stats

zero_stats_cleaned.description: Removed zero and null stat values from accessories

orb_of_king_dulin.name: Orb of King Dulin
orb_of_king_dulin.tier_explanation: This free artifact grants 200 patk and 100k damage cap up. Enough said.

effects.description: Increases damage cap by 100,000

bewitching_cloak.name: Bewitching Cloak
bewitching_cloak.tier_explanation: In many fights, the ability to stay alive without mitigation on turn 1 is essential. This item covers that and is very versatile overall, providing 5 instances of physical and elemental evasion from the start of the fight.

effects.description: In many fights, the ability to stay alive without mitigation on turn 1 is essential. This item covers that and is very versatile overall, providing 5 instances of physical and elemental evasion from t...

birdofparadise_tailfeather.name: Bird-of-Paradise Tailfeather
birdofparadise_tailfeather.tier_explanation: Reduces axe resistance on break. Unique effect to use in all axe damage teams.

effects.description: Reduces axe resistance on break. Unique effect to use in all axe damage teams.

brilliant_tacticians_medal.name: Brilliant Tactician's Medal
brilliant_tacticians_medal.tier_explanation: Varkyn's A4 accessory is excellent. It provides lots of speed (60) and offers an amazing 6 turns of elemental defense down that can be capped and extended with 4* Laura, or improved with Signa's A4.

effects.description: Varkyn's A4 accessory is excellent. It provides lots of speed (60) and offers an amazing 6 turns of elemental defense down that can be capped and extended with 4* Laura, or improved with Signa's A4.

light_of_succession.name: Light of Succession
light_of_succession.tier_explanation: Ditraina's exclusive accessory's only downside is that it's exclusive. +1 buff received duration is such a good effect that we bring 4* Lucetta / Mabel just because of it.

effects.description: Ditraina's exclusive accessory's only downside is that it's exclusive. +1 buff received duration is such a good effect that we bring 4* Lucetta / Mabel just because of it.

sage_helvas_orb.name: Sage Helva's Orb
sage_helvas_orb.tier_explanation: This free artifact grants 200 eatk and 100k damage cap up. The only reason it's not an S+ accessory is because physical damage is so dominant.

effects.description: Increases damage cap by 100

clerics_cloak_pin.name: Cleric's Cloak Pin
clerics_cloak_pin.tier_explanation: Lianna's exclusive accessory provides her a much needed SP reduction.

effects.description: Lianna's exclusive accessory provides her a much needed SP reduction.

creators_emblem.name: Creator's Emblem
creators_emblem.tier_explanation: When equipped with Sacred Emblem the unit gets 30% passive patk and eatk up. Very good to cap the passive attack stat and to improve healing from the healer of a phys team.

effects.description: When equipped with Sacred Emblem the unit gets 30% passive patk and eatk up. Very good to cap the passive attack stat and to improve healing from the healer of a phys team.

dance_duelists_barrette.name: Dance Duelist's Barrette
dance_duelists_barrette.tier_explanation: Glossom's A4 accessory provides good HP (400) and passive elemental and physical attack buff when below 75% HP. If you have NieR collab character A2, this is an awesome accessory for her because berserk guarantees the buff.

effects.description: Glossom's A4 accessory provides good HP (400) and passive elemental and physical attack buff when below 75% HP. If you have NieR collab character A2, this is an awesome accessory for her because berse...

dark_rune_vi.name: Dark Rune VI
dark_rune_vi.tier_explanation: Dark damage up is rare and good dark damage dealers are not scholars with 30% dark damage up passives - such as Primrose, Auguste, Jillmeila (if you can't get bleed reliably)

effects.description: Increase Dark damage by 30%

fire_rune_vi.name: Fire Rune VI
fire_rune_vi.tier_explanation: Many fire damage dealers are scholars, but there are notable exceptions (e.g. Therion, possibly even Largo). This item becomes less important if you have Frederica.

effects.description: Many fire damage dealers are scholars, but there are notable exceptions (e.g. Therion, possibly even Largo). This item becomes less important if you have Frederica.

garde_style_successors_cloak.name: Garde Style Successor's Cloak
garde_style_successors_cloak.tier_explanation: Mirgardi's A4 accessory provides the ability to recover 15% HP when hit, effectively reducing incoming damage by 85%. Good defensive item.

effects.description: Mirgardi's A4 accessory provides the ability to recover 15% HP when hit, effectively reducing incoming damage by 85%. Good defensive item.

great_blossoms_crest_yin.name: Great Blossom's Crest (Yin)
great_blossoms_crest_yin.tier_explanation: This item provides taunt at full HP. However, unlike Edea's A4, it takes 2 slots and does not give the 1000 HP by itself. The effect is still a free action per turn every turn, which adds value to the item, especially when equipped by characters that have natural sidestep abilities like Bargello, Canary, etc.

effects.description: This item provides taunt at full HP. However, unlike Edea's A4, it takes 2 slots and does not give the 1000 HP by itself. The effect is still a free action per turn every turn, which adds value to the...

ice_rune_vi.name: Ice Rune VI
ice_rune_vi.tier_explanation: Some ice damage dealers don't have ice damage up: most notably Eleonora.

effects.description: Some ice damage dealers don't have ice damage up: most notably Eleonora.

improvised_fishing_rod.name: Improvised Fishing Rod
improvised_fishing_rod.tier_explanation: Kenneth's A4 accessory has decent elemental attack and provides passive ice def down at the start of the battle. It can be extended by abilities (e.g. Aslyte's passive ice def down on break) and Sofia's A4

effects.description: Kenneth's A4 accessory has decent elemental attack and provides passive ice def down at the start of the battle. It can be extended by abilities (e.g. Aslyte's passive ice def down on break) and Sofia...

light_rune_vi.name: Light Rune VI
light_rune_vi.tier_explanation: Varkyn and Eliza are usual go-to light damage dealers - the other will very likely benefit from light damage up.

effects.description: Varkyn and Eliza are usual go-to light damage dealers - the other will very likely benefit from light damage up.

mercenarys_barrette.name: Mercenary's Barrette
mercenarys_barrette.tier_explanation: Tikilen's exclusive accessory provides great amounts of magic. With fortune weapons warriors have become good at dealing elemental damage.

effects.description: Tikilen's exclusive accessory provides great amounts of magic. With fortune weapons warriors have become good at dealing elemental damage.

nightshade_cloak.name: Nightshade Cloak
nightshade_cloak.tier_explanation: Hujheb's exclusive accessory is better than it looks. Getting 6 wisdom arrows at the start of the battle allows Hujheb to cast his buffs without needing to use any skills. In scenarios where he is just supporting the team, he can cap active patk and bow damage up by himself with this.

effects.description: Hujheb's exclusive accessory is better than it looks. Getting 6 wisdom arrows at the start of the battle allows Hujheb to cast his buffs without needing to use any skills. In scenarios where he is jus...

occult_pendant.name: Occult Pendant
occult_pendant.tier_explanation: Unconditional passive 10% eatk up with 50 eatk. Good option to cap eatk. Also good for healers since eatk buffs improve healing.

effects.description: Unconditional passive 10% eatk up with 50 eatk. Good option to cap eatk. Also good for healers since eatk buffs improve healing.

rosary_of_truth.name: Rosary of Truth
rosary_of_truth.tier_explanation: Yan Long's exclusive accessory is probably a staple on him. It provides a massive +150 phys atk and also some speed and crit.

effects.description: Grants 150 Phys Attack

sacred_emblem.name: Sacred Emblem
sacred_emblem.tier_explanation: When equipped with Creator's Emblem the unit gets 30% passive patk and eatk up. Very good to cap the passive attack stat and to improve healing from the healer of a phys team.

effects.description: When equipped with Creator's Emblem the unit gets 30% passive patk and eatk up. Very good to cap the passive attack stat and to improve healing from the healer of a phys team.

solomons_thighbone.name: Solomon's Thighbone
solomons_thighbone.tier_explanation: Along with Wingate's A4 accessory, this can help reduce passive dark resistance.

effects.description: Along with Wingate's A4 accessory, this can help reduce passive dark resistance.

adventurers_emblem.name: Adventurer's Emblem
adventurers_emblem.tier_explanation: Besides providing 200 HP, the item is useful to boost any tank's regen capabilities as well as provide extra regen to a character that is in the same row as the party healer (and thus doesn't receive heals)

effects.description: Increase Sword damage by 10%

anniversary_scarf.name: Anniversary Scarf
anniversary_scarf.tier_explanation: Besides providing a great 365 HP, the item is useful to boost any tank's regen capabilities. Nowadays multiple characters heal the full party so the item lost some value.

blood_soaked_cup.name: Blood Soaked Cup
blood_soaked_cup.tier_explanation: Cup is a very powerful unique item that caps elemental attack by itself. While the 3 turn duration may seem bad, it can be extended by 5* dancer Lynette passive skill "Empowering Exchange". It lost some value with multiple units that can provide passive eatk up

effects.description: Cup is a very powerful unique item that caps elemental attack by itself. While the 3 turn duration may seem bad, it can be extended by 5* dancer Lynette passive skill "Empowering Exchange". It lost...

boots_of_the_black_cat.name: Boots of the Black Cat
boots_of_the_black_cat.tier_explanation: Obtaining 1 dodge when moving to the front row is very good when the enemy does not attack with multiple hits. This item might be A tier.

effects.description: Grants 1 Dodge When Moving To The Front Row Is Very Good When The Enemy Does Not Attack

dance_duelists_cologne.name: Dance Duelist's Cologne
dance_duelists_cologne.tier_explanation: Glossom's EX2 accessory is a stat stick at +100 patk. The Glossom's exclusive +duration is a S+ tier effect but this requires bringing Glossom and using him as support with his +patk accessories. Somewhat contradictory.

dance_duelists_wristband.name: Dance Duelist's Wristband
dance_duelists_wristband.tier_explanation: Glossom's exclusive accessory provides a very high amount of physical attack but no HP or speed.

effects.description: Glossom's exclusive accessory provides a very high amount of physical attack but no HP or speed.

defensive_speed_belt_iii.name: Defensive Speed Belt III
defensive_speed_belt_iii.tier_explanation: This accessory provides a relatively large amount of speed (30) which is very helpful to control turn order.

effects.description: This accessory provides a relatively large amount of speed (30) which is very helpful to control turn order.

dragons_scarf_iv.name: Dragon's Scarf IV
dragons_scarf_iv.tier_explanation: SP management is very important in longer fights.

effects.description: SP management is very important in longer fights.

dragons_scarf_v.name: Dragon's Scarf V
dragons_scarf_v.tier_explanation: SP management is very important in longer fights.

effects.description: SP management is very important in longer fights.

dragons_scarf_vi.name: Dragon's Scarf VI
dragons_scarf_vi.tier_explanation: SP management is very important in longer fights.

effects.description: SP management is very important in longer fights.

ebony_dragons_scarf.name: Ebony Dragon's Scarf
ebony_dragons_scarf.tier_explanation: SP management is very important in longer fights.

effects.description: SP management is very important in longer fights.

ediths_brilliant_wings.name: Edith's Brilliant Wings
ediths_brilliant_wings.tier_explanation: This free artifact grants 200 pdef and edef, in addition to some HP and SP regen. We have much better uses for an accessory slot. This has its niche use for backrow units.

elite_thiefs_emblem.name: Elite Thief's Emblem
elite_thiefs_emblem.tier_explanation: The 15% dagger damage up is difficult to obtain outside of A4 accessories and useful for thieves.

effects.description: Increase Dagger damage by 15%

empowering_bangle.name: Empowering Bangle
empowering_bangle.tier_explanation: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

effects.description: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

empowering_pendant.name: Empowering Pendant
empowering_pendant.tier_explanation: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

effects.description: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

energy_belt_iii.tier_explanation: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

effects.description: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

energy_belt_iv.name: Energy Belt IV
energy_belt_iv.tier_explanation: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

effects.description: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

energy_belt_v.name: Energy Belt V
energy_belt_v.tier_explanation: This item provides excellent amounts of HP and SP (500 and 50 respectively)

effects.description: This item provides excellent amounts of HP and SP (500 and 50 respectively)

festive_winter_scarf.name: Festive Winter Scarf
festive_winter_scarf.tier_explanation: This item provides some speed, large elemental attack and some useful SP regen, which is quite good in prolonged fights.

effects.description: This item provides some speed, large elemental attack and some useful SP regen, which is quite good in prolonged fights.

gladiatory_encyclopedia.name: Gladiatory Encyclopedia
gladiatory_encyclopedia.tier_explanation: Hammy's exclusive accessory provides a lot of physical attack and the ability to show weak points at the start of the battle. Very situational for when Hammy is going to be a damage dealer (not often realistically).

effects.description: Hammy's exclusive accessory provides a lot of physical attack and the ability to show weak points at the start of the battle. Very situational for when Hammy is going to be a damage dealer (not often ...

great_blossoms_crest_yang.name: Great Blossom's Crest (Yang)
great_blossoms_crest_yang.tier_explanation: Besides providing a great 365 HP, the item is useful to boost any tank's regen capabilities. Nowadays multiple characters heal the full party so the item is not as valuable.

great_krakens_crest_yang.name: Great Kraken's Crest (Yang)
great_krakens_crest_yang.tier_explanation: Stat stick at +100 patk/eatk. If you can defend the damage dealer properly the -300 pdef/edef shouldn't matter. The 30% patk/eatk when combined to it's Yin piece is also good. Excellent for backpack healers like Rinyuu.

heroic_apothecarys_emblem.name: Heroic Apothecary's Emblem
heroic_apothecarys_emblem.tier_explanation: This unique 30% axe damage up is useful for axe damage dealers if not bringing Hayes.

effects.description: Increase Axe damage by 30%

heroic_hunters_emblem.name: Heroic Hunter's Emblem
heroic_hunters_emblem.tier_explanation: This unique 30% bow damage up is very useful for most hunters.

effects.description: Increase Bow damage by 30%

heroic_warriors_emblem.name: Heroic Warrior's Emblem
heroic_warriors_emblem.tier_explanation: This unique 30% sword damage up is very useful for warriors without passive sword damage up skills or characters that hit sword without being warriors (e.g. A2)

effects.description: Increase Sword damage by 30%

inventors_drafting_board.name: Inventor's Drafting Board
inventors_drafting_board.tier_explanation: Largo's A4 accessory provides lots of HP (600), passive spear damage up, status ailment extended duration. Excellent defensive item, and can extend e.g. Therion's paralysis by 1 turn per proc.

effects.description: Largo's A4 accessory provides lots of HP (600), passive spear damage up, status ailment extended duration. Excellent defensive item, and can extend e.g. Therion's paralysis by 1 turn per proc.

kotas_right_glove.name: Kota's Right Glove
kotas_right_glove.tier_explanation: Kota's is a very powerful unique item that caps physical attack by itself. While the 3 turn duration may seem bad, it can be extended by 5* dancer Lynette or Eleonora passive skills. It lost some value now that we have multiple units that can give some form of passive patk.

effects.description: Kota's is a very powerful unique item that caps physical attack by itself. While the 3 turn duration may seem bad, it can be extended by 5* dancer Lynette or Eleonora passive skills. It lost some v...

largos_magic_booster.name: Largo's Magic Booster
largos_magic_booster.tier_explanation: Largo's EX2 accessory provides massive eatk (130). For Largo, it also gives 30% passive eatk which is somewhat easy to get nowadays.

effects.description: Largo's EX2 accessory provides massive eatk (130). For Largo, it also gives 30% passive eatk which is somewhat easy to get nowadays.

lightning_rune_vi.name: Lightning Rune VI
lightning_rune_vi.tier_explanation: This is a good item on paper but lightning just doesn't see too much play for now.

effects.description: This is a good item on paper but lightning just doesn't see too much play for now.

magical_speed_belt_v.name: Magical Speed Belt V
magical_speed_belt_v.tier_explanation: This item provides very nice speed on top of good elemental attack (50 each)

effects.description: This item provides very nice speed on top of good elemental attack (50 each)

master_apothecarys_armlet.name: Master Apothecary's Armlet
master_apothecarys_armlet.tier_explanation: Gertrude's exclusive accessory is a nice fit for her with the extra speed and the axe damage up, even conditional. The speed alone would be useful.

effects.description: Gertrude's exclusive accessory is a nice fit for her with the extra speed and the axe damage up, even conditional. The speed alone would be useful.

master_apothecarys_necklace.name: Master Apothecary's Necklace
master_apothecarys_necklace.tier_explanation: Gertrude's EX2 accessory has massive patk (130) but lacks utility. Still very helpful when extra damage is the only thing needed.

effects.description: Gertrude's EX2 accessory has massive patk (130) but lacks utility. Still very helpful when extra damage is the only thing needed.

master_apothecarys_wrap.name: Master Apothecary's Wrap
master_apothecarys_wrap.tier_explanation: Gertrude's A4 accessory provides speed, lots of physical attack and axe damage up. However, pets now help control unit speed.

effects.description: Grants 4 Accessory Provides Speed, Lots Of Physical Attack

mercenarys_cape.name: Mercenary's Cape
mercenarys_cape.tier_explanation: Tikilen's EX2 accessory is a stat stick at +100 eatk. Good filler accessory also for backpack healers like Rinyuu. Unfortunately Tikilen is so outclassed in wind damage that we won't be seeing the secondary effects much.

minotaur_scarf_ii.name: Minotaur Scarf II
minotaur_scarf_ii.tier_explanation: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

effects.description: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

monks_bottle_gourd.name: Monk's Bottle Gourd
monks_bottle_gourd.tier_explanation: Yan Long's EX2 accessory provides some attack and speed. The effect of gaining 3BP on break is basically useless because we would like to use accessories that inflict debuffs on break instead.

effects.description: Yan Long's EX2 accessory provides some attack and speed. The effect of gaining 3BP on break is basically useless because we would like to use accessories that inflict debuffs on break instead.

necklace_of_icirlo.name: Necklace of I'Cirlo
necklace_of_icirlo.tier_explanation: Ri'tu's EX2 accessory is a stat stick at +100 patk. The exclusive effect for Ri'tu is quite good providing a very rare passive dagger resistance down. However, that requires bringing Ri'tu who is severely outclassed by many thieves.

new_years_cloak.name: New Year's Cloak
new_years_cloak.tier_explanation: This item is not a gacha 5* A4 but it is essentially paid at 1350 rubies. This is a very good item in some niches since it provides 5 instances of physical evasion. Free actions are very valuable in the cleric tower, for example, and evasion is a good skill. With evasion pets and units, this loses some value.

powerful_speed_belt_v.tier_explanation: This item provides very nice speed on top of good attack (50 each)

ruby_dragon_scarf.name: Ruby Dragon Scarf
ruby_dragon_scarf.tier_explanation: SP management is very important in longer fights.

effects.description: SP management is very important in longer fights.

vanguard_scarf.name: Vanguard Scarf
vanguard_scarf.tier_explanation: This item gives an excellent 30% speed buff for 3 turns and 30 speed. This is excellent to control turn order.  With pets, however, speed is much more manageable.

wind_maidens_hairband.name: Wind Maiden's Hairband

winged_sheath.name: Winged Sheath
winged_sheath.tier_explanation: Ri'tu's A4 accessory provides physical attack and dagger damage up. It is great to complement Falco's passive on Therion and A2, for example.

effects.description: Grants 4 Accessory Provides Physical Attack

agility_bangle.name: Agility Bangle
agility_bangle.tier_explanation: Speed is a useful stat to control turn order.

beast_tooth_accessory.name: Beast Tooth Accessory
beast_tooth_accessory.tier_explanation: This item gives 70 patk and -50 speed. We can now disable speed nodes but reducing speed still has some niche use.

beastlings_feather_adorn.name: Beastling's Feather Adorn
beastlings_feather_adorn.tier_explanation: This item gives 15% bow damage up and some damage. May be useful if passive bow damage up is needed.

elite_dancers_emblem.name: Elite Dancer's Emblem
elite_dancers_emblem.tier_explanation: If an enemy is weak to fan and the roster has no other options, this might see some niche use.

effects.description: If an enemy is weak to fan and the roster has no other options, this might see some niche use.

energy_belt_ii.tier_explanation: HP accessories are great in non-damage units.

feintzs_floral_ornament.name: Feintz's Floral Ornament
feintzs_floral_ornament.tier_explanation: Although this item provides 30 patk and eatk, the lack of extra HP and other stats makes it very niche.

effects.description: Grants 30 Pattack And Eattack, The Lack Of Extra Hp And Other Stats Makes It Very Niche.

great_krakens_crest_yin.name: Great Kraken's Crest (Yin)
great_krakens_crest_yin.tier_explanation: This accessory gives passive 30% patk/eatk up when combined with the Yang accessory. However, we generally have good ways to get these buffs, which means this accessory is not so useful.

effects.description: This accessory gives passive 30% patk/eatk up when combined with the Yang accessory. However, we generally have good ways to get these buffs, which means this accessory is not so useful.

heroic_dancers_emblem.name: Heroic Dancer's Emblem
heroic_dancers_emblem.tier_explanation: This unique 30% fan damage up can help dancers deal a lot of damage with fans. Unfortunately, there are usually much better options, although it is probably a good item for Glossom.

effects.description: Increase Fan damage by 30%

heroic_scholars_emblem.name: Heroic Scholar's Emblem
heroic_scholars_emblem.tier_explanation: This unique 30% tome damage up can help scholars deal a lot of damage with tomes. Unfortunately, there are usually much better options.

effects.description: Increase Tome damage by 30%

inventors_compass.name: Inventor's Compass
inventors_compass.tier_explanation: Largo's exclusive accessory is only useful for him, and only in situations where you would use him to deal damage - probably not many.

mermaid_tights.tier_explanation: Nullify can't switch may have a use or 2 but certainly extremely niche.
